snippet: A spokesman for President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia said the New England Patriots’ owner, Robert Kraft, meant for a diamond-encrusted Super Bowl ring to be a gift to Mr. Putin eight years ago.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia said the New England Patriots’ owner, Robert Kraft, meant for a diamond-encrusted Super Bowl ring to be a gift to Mr. Putin eight years ago.

headline.main: Kraft’s Super Bowl Ring Said to Be a Gift to Putin
headline.print_headline: Kraft’s Ring Said to Be a Gift
